abstract: Tencent Holdings, China’s leading Internet provider, announced Monday that it was investing about $300 million in Digital Sky Technologies, the Russian Internet holding company that acquired a stake in Facebook last year.
snippet: Tencent Holdings, China’s leading Internet provider, announced Monday that it was investing about $300 million in Digital Sky Technologies, the Russian Internet holding company that acquired a stake in Facebook last year.
lead_paragraph: Tencent Holdings, China’s leading Internet provider, said Monday that it was investing about  $300 million in Digital Sky Technologies, the Russian Internet holding company that acquired a stake in Facebook last year.

headline.main: Tencent to Invest $300 Million in Facebook Backer
